name: Find the Impostor
description:
Find the Impostor

General

Find the Impostor is a small game that i made alone for a Game Jam. The Game was made in one week and some assets does not belong me.

Gameplay

You can press the left or right button to kill the person next to the button. In this game i tried something like a random generated biography so you can find out who the real and who the impostor is.
